column12: Pay X food. Draw X cards.
When you play a Food card, +2 Food
When you play a Wood card, +1 Wood
When you play a Stone card, +1 Stone
When you play a Coal card, +1 Coal
When you play on the North Side, +1 Wood
When you play on the South Side, +1 Wood
When you play on the East Side, +1 Stone
When you play on the West Side, +1 Stone
When you play on the North Side, +1 Coal
When you play on the South Side, +1 Coal
When you play on the East Side, +1 Coal
When you play on the West Side, +1 Coal
